issue.title: [CF 382] change tint on icon borders
issue.body:
oxboy555

Cyb, the new color enhancements are great.  Is there a way to change tint on icon borders?

Cybeloras

Are you using Masque? There is no way to modify the borders if you aren't because there aren't any actual borders. I suppose I could add support for changing the border color for Masque-skinned icon, but it isn't a top priority.

Do you want the border to use whatever color the icon is using? - That would actually be extremely easy to implement.  Having a separate color for the icon and the border would take much more time.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #382 | Raw

comments.body:
• Added an option to color the border of Masque skins with the coloring applied to icons. This setting can be found under the *Global Colors* config in TMW's main options.

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
